meshthings.mesh_to_surfacemap¶

Transformer from simple mesh to surfacemap

clothfactory_parts.meshthings.mesh_to_surfacemap.mesh_to_surfacemap: datagraph_factory.processes.factory_leaf = factory_leaf{clothfactory_parts.meshthings.mesh_to_surfacemapmesh to surfacemap}¶

Creates a surfacemap from a mesh. Works by just giving the generator of the surfacemap the mesh.

clothfactory_parts.meshthings.mesh_to_surfacemap._create_datagraphs()¶
clothfactory_parts.meshthings.mesh_to_surfacemap._call_function(mymesh: clothfactory_parts.meshthings.meshtypes.ply_surface) → Dict[str, clothfactory_parts.meshthings.meshtypes.ply_2dmap]¶

This creates createcloth.meshhandler.surfacemap for the given mesh ‘mymesh’. The surfacemap is framed by the border ‘myborder’.

strickgraph.strickgraph_datatypes¶
